offseasonTrades.details: Barkley signed a one-year deal with Philly in 2024 after no long-term deal with NYG. He thrived behind the Eagles' O-line (2,005 rush yards):contentReference[oaicite:93]{index=93}, leading the NFL in rushing.
Tennessee traded Henry in the final year of his deal to Baltimore. The move paid off – Henry rumbled for 1,921 yards and 16 TD with the Ravens in 2024:contentReference[oaicite:94]{index=94}.

After playing on the franchise tag, Jacobs left Vegas for Green Bay. He led the Packers backfield with 1,329 rush yards in 2024:contentReference[oaicite:95]{index=95}, replacing Aaron Jones as the lead back.

In a blockbuster spring 2024 trade, the rebuilding Raiders sent Adams to the Rams. Adams reunited with Matthew Stafford and posted a 1,000+ yard, 8 TD season in LA:contentReference[oaicite:96]{index=96}.

Chicago dealt Fields after drafting Caleb Williams. The Jets, reeling from Aaron Rodgers' injury, acquired Fields to be their young QB. He started 10 games for New York in 2024:contentReference[oaicite:97]{index=97}.

Rodgers and the Jets parted ways after his Achilles injury in 2023. He technically became a free agent (listed as FA in 2024 stats):contentReference[oaicite:98]{index=98}. Rumors swirled about retirement, though he has not officially filed.

Coming off a 2023 Achilles tear, Cousins signed a prove-it deal with Atlanta. He threw for 3,508 yards in 14 games for the Falcons in 2024:contentReference[oaicite:99]{index=99} before another late-season injury.
Las Vegas traded for Geno Smith to replace Jimmy Garoppolo. Geno, coming off a Pro Bowl in Seattle, had 4,320 passing yards as the Raiders' starter in 2024:contentReference[oaicite:100]{index=100}.

Denver moved on from Russ, dealing him to the Giants. New York hoped the veteran could stabilize their QB situation. Wilson went 5–6 as a starter (2,482 yards, 16 TD) before a concussion ended his 2024:contentReference[oaicite:101]{index=101}.

The Dolphins acquired TE Jonnu Smith to add a versatile weapon. Smith responded with a career-high 8 TD catches in 2024:contentReference[oaicite:102]{index=102}, becoming a red-zone favorite in Miami.

Arizona released Ertz late in 2023; he signed with Washington. The veteran TE started all 17 games for the Commanders in 2024:contentReference[oaicite:103]{index=103}, providing a reliable target and 7 TDs for the young QB.

Star CB Jalen Ramsey and Miami mutually agreed to explore trade options in the 2025 offseason:contentReference[oaicite:104]{index=104}. While not directly a fantasy player, a trade could impact the Dolphins DST value.

Longtime Falcons DT Grady Jarrett signed with Chicago in 2025 after a season-ending injury in 2024. He joins a revamped Bears defense (Atlanta drafted his replacement in the first round):contentReference[oaicite:105]{index=105}.
After New England drafted Drake Maye in 2024, Mac Jones has been rumored on the trade block heading into 2025. No deal materialized before the draft, but this will be a situation to monitor.
